attributes.additional_details: Keeping the parks open and not cleaning them means people from different households shall be touching the same things with their hands that might not be washed. Kids (or even adults that are supervising their kids) may have COVID-19 or other viruses on them. It would be better to clean the parks daily so that most of the germs get washed away. Little kids could go to the park and may put their hands in their mouths which then means they could be giving themselves and their family members Covid.
attributes.background: You should get volunteers to wipe down play-parks daily with antibacterial wipes to help stop the spread of germs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
